function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible modes of transmission of SARS-CoV-2 including airborne transmission via aerosols.","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread community transmission of the virus, leading to a higher number of infected individuals.","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective ventilation systems, air purification, and use of personal protective equipment (PPE) to reduce airborne transmission.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, and advanced ventilation systems.","People":"Residents, tourists, and individuals in affected areas at risk of exposure to airborne transmission.","Owner":"Health authorities, building owners, facility managers, and public health organizations."}]}
